cards.title: Lung
setup: At the start of the game {Lung} enters play Gang Leader side up. Put {Brute} into play, Gang Leader side up.
gameplay: When the villain trash is shuffled into the villain deck, flip {Brute}, and flip {Lung}.
cards.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, discard the top card of the villain deck
flippedGameplay: When flipped to this side, destroy all villain cards in play and put all cards in the villain deck into the villain trash.
Reduce damage dealt to Lung by 1.
cards.flippedAdvanced: When flipped to this side, the heroes lose the game

cards.title: Brute
gameplay: If there are 10 or more cards in the villain trash, the first time {Lung} is dealt damage each round, reduce the damage by 1.

At the end of the villain turn play the top card of the villain deck then:{BR}- {Lung} deals X melee damage to all hero targets, where X = 1 + the number of cards in the villain trash / 5, then,{BR}- If there are 5 or more cards in the villain trash, {Lung} regains 1 HP, then,{BR}- If there are 15 or more cards in the villain trash, {Lung} regains 1 HP.
flippedGameplay: {Lung} is immune to damage dealt by Environment cards.
At the end of the villain turn {Lung} deals 6 melee and 2 irreducible fire damage to all hero targets then:{BR}- Lung regains 3 HP, then,{BR}- Destroy {H - 1} hero ongoing or equipment cards.

cards.title: Burst of Flame
cards.body: {Lung} deals the hero target with the highest HP X fire damage, where X = 1 + the number of cards in the villain trash / 2

cards.title: Smash
body: {Lung} deals the hero target with the lowest HP 2 melee damage.
Destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card
cards.flavorText: You don't properly appreciate what{BR}superhuman strength means until you see{BR}someone leap from the sidewalk to the{BR}second floor of a building

cards.title: Growing Anger
cards.body: Discard the top 3 cards of the villain deck. Play the top card of the villain deck

flavorQuotes.text: You know how this works, right?{BR}He only gets stronger the longer you{BR}fight him. If you haven't finished him off{BR}by now, you're probably not going to.

cards.title: Wings
cards.body: {Lung} is immune to damage from Environment cards
cards.flavorText: Spearlike growths stuck out of his{BR}shoulders in what I realized were{BR}the beginnings of wings.

cards.title: White-Hot Flame
cards.body: Fire damage dealt by {Lung} is irreducible
cards.flavorText: ...the steel-like flesh just beneath{BR}Leviathan's skin was blackening and{BR}charring to ash by proximity alone.

cards.title: Pyrokinesis
cards.body: Whenever {Lung} deals melee damage to a target, {Lung} deals 2 fire damage to that target
cards.flavorText: Lung blasted her with a{BR}torrent of roaring flame.

cards.title: Terrible Burns
body: Whenever a hero is dealt fire damage by {Lung}, destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card.
At the end of the villain turn, {Lung} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 2} fire damage
cards.flavorText: He lit his hand on fire.{BR}My mangled arm went up in flames.

cards.title: Bakuda
body: At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top card of the villain deck:{BR}- If it is a One-Shot, {Bakuda} deals 5 fire damage to all non-villain targets.{BR}- If it is an Ongoing, each hero discards 1 card.{BR}- If it is a target, the hero with the most cards in play destroys all of them
Shuffle the revealed card back into the villain deck
cards.flavorText: Behind their assembled group,{BR}an altered grenade launcher danging{BR}from one strap around her shoulders,{BR}was Bakuda.

cards.title: Oni Lee
body: At the end of the villain turn, {OniLee} deals the hero target with the lowest HP 3 melee damage.
Whenever {OniLee} would take damage, reveal the top card of the villain deck. If it is a one-shot prevent the damage. Shuffle the revealed card back into the villain deck
cards.flavorText: He could teleport, but when he did,{BR}he left a body behind that could act{BR}autonomously for a few seconds.

cards.title: ABB Thugs
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, {ABBThugs} deal the hero target with the lowest HP 2 projectile damage

flavorQuotes.text: The 'Azn Bad Boys' is a shit name
